original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam sa āsavam kusalam dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ na anāsavaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ anāsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam anāsavam kusalam dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ na anāsavaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka hetuyā dve pe avigate dve

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavavippayutto naanāsavo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam sa āsavam akusalam dhammam paṭicca āsava vippayuttaḥ na anāsavaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā āsavavippayutto nasāsavo naabyākato
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam sa āsavam abyākatam dhammam paccayā āsava vippayuttaḥ na sa āsavaḥ na abyākataḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā āsava vippayuttam sa āsavam abyākatam dhammam paccayā

original: āsavavippayutto naanāsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: āsava vippayuttaḥ na anāsavaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve pe avigate dve
